summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.2°C) and outside temperature (down 1.9°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1757 m), feels like temperature (up 5.1°C), outside temperature (up 3.9°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

A few light raindrops may fall, fog or low cloud is expected, and the light is absent. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
